entry.title: anoma/namada-trusted-setup-claimer
entry.summary:
Sign arbitrary messages with keys obtained from Namada's trusted setup

Namada Trusted Setup Claimer

CLI util to sign arbitrary messages with. The signing keys are obtained from Namada's trusted setup ceremony.

To run it just type:

cargo run

You will be asked to provide the seed used during the trusted setup ceremony. Once you've done that, you can choose to:

  1. Show the public key
  2. Sign a message
